channel.title: Realities on Atmanaut
channel.description: Recent content in Realities on Atmanaut

item.title: Questions
item.description: Hard questions From Kant: What can I know? What should I do? What may I hope? Who are we? How did we get here? Why are we here? Who wants to know? Is this a game? How do we win? Can we win? What is there to fear? Who wants pizza? Is there anybody out there? Does the Earth know we’re here? Does she have feelings? Do electrons make choices?
